identity.name: BillByteKOT - Cyber Tactical POS
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Mix Cyberpunk aesthetics with Swiss usability
Speed is a Feature: Every interaction must feel instant (under 100ms)
Dark Mode First: Optimized for low-light restaurant environments
Data Density: High information density without clutter

typography.strategy: The 'Soft Utility' Archetype with a Cyber Twist

headings.usage: All major headings (h1-h3). REPLACE Space Grotesk.

mono.usage: Receipt previews, order IDs, financial data, KOT tickets

typography.instructions: Remove 'Space Grotesk' from App.css and import 'Chivo' and 'JetBrains Mono' from Google Fonts.

primary.description: Electric Cyan for primary actions (Pay, Print, Add)

secondary.description: Neon Purple for AI features and secondary highlights

dashboard_grid.rules: Use col-span-2 for main charts, col-span-1 for metrics. No jagged bottoms.

pos_grid.rules: Strict uniformity for touch targets. Minimum touch area 44px.

buttons.primary: bg-cyan-500 hover:bg-cyan-600 text-white font-bold rounded-lg shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(6,182,212,0.3)] transition-all hover:scale-[1.02]
buttons.secondary: bg-zinc-800 hover:bg-zinc-700 text-white border border-zinc-700 rounded-lg

cards.base: bg-zinc-900/80 border border-white/5 rounded-xl p-6 hover:border-cyan-500/30 transition-colors

inputs.base: bg-zinc-950 border-zinc-800 focus:border-cyan-500 focus:ring-1 focus:ring-cyan-500 rounded-lg h-10

status_badges.base: px-2 py-1 rounded-md text-xs font-mono font-bold uppercase tracking-wider

visual_enhancers.textures: Use subtle noise texture on the main background to reduce digital flatness.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. REMOVE 'Space Grotesk' from App.css. Import 'Chivo' and 'JetBrains Mono'.
2. IMPLEMENT Dark Mode by default. Ensure 'dark' class is applied to html/body.
4. DO NOT use generic gradients. Use the 'Electric Void' palette.
6. FOR DASHBOARD: Use the Bento Grid layout. Avoid equal-sized cards.
7. FOR POS: Focus on speed. No layout shifts. Instant feedback.
8. PRINT PREVIEW: Use a monospace font (JetBrains Mono) and white background for the preview container to simulate thermal paper.
9. AI FEATURES: Use the 'Neon Purple' accent color to distinguish AI insights from regular data.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
